TopicTitle: Adding air ballons to the simulation.

Articles.Content:
So I just read this article.

http://www.citylab.com/tech/2014/07/the-surprisingly-strong-case-for-colonizing-venus/373560/

And I thought if KSP simulated gases and the way lighter gasses floated up into the atmosphere. Then if we had some parts added to KSP that could be filled with said gasses. We could then simulate what there talking about in this article and colonize the upper atmosphere of Jool, and Eve.

The parts would be useful in other ways as well. Modders would go to town with this.

Hal

Edited July 2, 2014 by halbert5150

Actually, modders already kinda have...

But yeah, it would be cool to see balloons in stock, though there are a lot more things I'd like to see first.
I've been wanting to see stock airship parts since I first started playing KSP.
